about_the_game:
"Command a battle on the chessboard. Abandon grand civilization themes and focus on a single combat; that's what we excel at."

This is a casual strategy game based on match-3 gameplay, incorporating the world of the flagship title "Dungeon No Dungeon" and introducing a completely new storyline and game mechanics.
detailed_description:
"Command a battle on the chessboard. Abandon grand civilization themes and focus on a single combat; that's what we excel at."

This is a casual strategy game based on match-3 gameplay, incorporating the world of the flagship title "Dungeon No Dungeon" and introducing a completely new storyline and game mechanics.
name: Dungeon No Dungeon: Tyrant's Endgame Demo
short_description: This is a casual strategy indie game that combines match-3, synthesis, and deck-building gameplay. It features a brand new storyline and game mechanics based on the world of "Dungeon No Dungeon".
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
